sliderTitle: Discover A World Of Enchanting Destinations

destination.head: Choose Your Destination and Plan Your Next Trip with Us
destination.desc: Going somewhere to celebrate this season? Whether you’re going home or somewhere to roam, we’ve got the travel tools to get you to your destination.

home.AboutDesc: Learn more about our company and services

intro.title: About Fly Cham
intro.paragraph1: With our launch, our goal has been to achieve excellence in every flight, ensuring comfort and safety, and connecting travelers to their favorite destinations in a distinctive way.
intro.paragraph2: We are proud of our services and our team that always strives to meet passengers' satisfaction.

mission.heading: Our Mission, Vision, and Value
mission.sideText: Unique experience that reflects our values of comfort and quality toward a future full of excellence.
mission.paragraph: Our commitment goes beyond the sky, as we seek to build sustainable and strong ties with our travelers and provide innovative services.

topic.title: Who We Are
topic.description: Shaping the future of air travel with a bold vision and a shared commitment. Fly Cham connects people, cultures, and opportunities across the region with reliability and forward-thinking service

card1.title: Our Responsibility
card1.text: Our journey doesn’t end in the sky. We believe in supporting communities, creating opportunities for youth, and embracing sustainability in everything we do.

card2.title: Our Fleet
card2.text: Modern, efficient, and built for comfort — our fleet is designed to meet the needs of today’s travelers.

loyalty.title: Exclusive Benefits with The Loyalty Program

trip.title: Plan Your Next Trip to Syria

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you every step of the way. Whether you're traveling with us, a business partner, or a member of the Cham Miles loyalty program, take advantage of the range of services available and don't hesitate to contact us for any assistance.

hours.range: Saturday to Thursday, 9:00 AM - Mid Night

hero.description: Discover Fly Cham destinations, including domestic, international, and indirect destinations, offering you comprehensive and comfortable travel services. Browse our flight schedule and book your next journey with us.

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.subtitle: Fly Cham is a Syrian-Emirati joint private commercial airline, officially launched in May 2025, with a bold vision to elevate the aviation sector across Syria and the region. Built on two core pillars, passenger air travel and air cargo transportation, Fly Cham operates an expanding network of domestic and international flight routes, tailored to meet the growing demands of the Syrian market and customers' expectations.

middle.highlight: Get ready to discover new cities in your own style
middle.description: Learn about our modern fleet equipped with the latest technologies to provide a safe and comfortable travel experience

responsibility.title: Our Responsibility
responsibility.description: We believe our role extends far beyond air travel. As we are committed to our responsibility toward society, empowering youth and all communities in Syria, and fostering a spirit of innovation among young people. We will be an active partner in building a brighter future and achieving a positive and sustainable impact.

bottom.statementTitle: Comfort, care, and excellence in every detail
bottom.statementDescription: Learn about our modern fleet equipped with the latest technologies to provide a safe and comfortable travel experience

community.title: Our Commitment to Community
community.desc: We believe our role extends far beyond air travel. As we are committed to our responsibility toward society, empowering youth and all communities in Syria, and fostering a spirit of innovation among young people. We will be an active partner in building a brighter future and achieving a positive and sustainable impact.

passengers.title: Towards Our Passengers
passengers.desc: We believe our role extends far beyond air travel. As we are committed to our responsibility toward society, empowering youth and all communities in Syria, and fostering a spirit of innovation among young people. We will be an active partner in building a brighter future and achieving a positive and sustainable impact.

syrianCommunity.title: Towards the Syrian Community
syrianCommunity.desc: We believe in supporting the Syrian community through various community initiatives, and sponsoring and support cultural events and local associations, as well as entrepreneurship, youth, and women's empowerment programs.

training.title: Training & Development
training.desc: We believe in nurturing talent from within. Through specialized aviation training programs and skills development workshops, we aim to build a new generation of aviation professionals, equipping our team members with the tools to succeed locally and globally via establishing Fly Cham own Training Center.

futureLeaders.title: Towards Future Leaders
futureLeaders.desc: Our vision includes creating meaningful opportunities for the youth. By fostering leadership, innovation, and entrepreneurship, to inspire the next wave of Syrian change-makers — in aviation and beyond.
